title: Welcome
subTitle: Your docker image is ready to use now
gettingStarted: In order to use your docker image you need to provide your MongoDB URI
message: Thank you for signing up. We are ready to provide you with all our services. One more step is needed to compelete your registration. Just verify your email address to get started.
btnSubMessage: If you need any further information, please don't hesitate to contact us
toRun: To run your docker container you need to provide the folowing environment variables:
mongoStandardUri: The standard URI connection scheme has the form: mongodb://localhost:27017
mongoSrvUri: The DNS SRV Url has the form: mongodb+srv://server.example.com/
